desc: EComposer is more than a Shopify app, it's a design tool closely linked to Shopify. Feel free to create stunning themes or quickly use one from our library. Everything is simple and easy to understand, you can know how to use EComposer within 30 minutes.

layout.text: Build stunning websites and pages that help you convert more–without coding, without stress. EComposer is more than just a page builder, it’s your personal design tool.
